ThingDef.label: animal bionic leg
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic leg. With its biogel nerve-link, powerful mini-servos, and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological leg in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic arm
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic arm. Silenced mini-servos give great strength, while the biogel nerve-link gives exquisite control. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological arm in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic tail
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic tail. It integrates silent mini-servos for strength and a biogel nerve-link for precise control, enhancing agility and speed. This surpasses biological tails, enabling faster and more agile movement.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic jaw
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic jaw. Enhanced with quantum-synchronized actuators, cutting-edge nanomaterials and neural interface technology to optimize bite strength and control.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic heart
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic heart. Equipped with neural-networked sensors, it offers real-time performance monitoring and adaptive response and will outperform any biological counterparts.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic spine
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic spine. Enhanced with bio-feedback algorithms, it offers real-time biomechanical adaptation and proprioceptive feedback. It matches the performance of a biological spine.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic stomach
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic stomach. It incorporates nano-gastric chambers and hyper-digestive enzymes, synchronized with gastric processors for optimal nutrient absorption and metabolic efficiency. It is better than a biological stomach in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic eye
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic eye. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, it is better than a biological eye in almost every way.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic nose
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic nose equipped with advanced olfactory sensors and targeting systems, enhancing the animal's ability to detect and precisely locate targets.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic ear
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic ear featuring advanced auditory sensors and real-time threat detection, enhancing the animal's ability to hear and pinpoint approaching dangers.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic beak
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic beak engineered from advanced, durable materials to restore biting and pecking functions. Should be able to replace almost any avian-like beak.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic tentacle
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic tentacle that replicates natural tentacle movements, offering superior grasping and manipulation capabilities for the animal. Bear in mind the original animal needs to have tentacles of its own. For extra tentacles, look into Anomaly implants.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic buoyancy mechanism
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic buoyancy mechanism. Should be able to replace hydrogen sacs and other exotic organs keeping hovering creatures in the air.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic shell
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic shell built with advanced, resilient materials, offering superior protection and structural support and designed to perfectly mimic natural shells.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic wing
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic wing engineered from lightweight, durable materials and providing enhanced maneuverability. Designed to replicate natural wing movements.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic blade
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic blade built with advanced, resilient materials. Will replace a range of biological structures such as single claws (not claws that are part of a paw, for example) and an insect's headclaw.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic stinger
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic stinger incorporating cutting-edge technology to enhance natural stinging capabilities. Engineered for precision and potency.

ThingDef.label: animal bionic horn
ThingDef.description: An animal bionic horn integrating advanced materials and engineering. It offers superior strength, durability, and potential enhancements such as sensory capabilities.

ThingDef.label: animal stealthskin implant
ThingDef.description: An animal stealthskin implant that renders the animal invisible by reflecting light around its body, allowing it to seamlessly blend with the environment.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: flick
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Flick jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: clean
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Clean jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: slaughter
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Slaughter animal jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: mine
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Mine jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: feed patient
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Feed Patient jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: harvest
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Harvest jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: sow
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables plant Sowing jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal work chip: hunting
ThingDef.description: An animal brain implant that empowers its brain function, allowing it to do complex jobs. This chip enables Hunting jobs.

ThingDef.label: animal shrinker implant
ThingDef.description: An animal shrinker implant that will reduce the body size of the animal, making it more nimble and hard to hit. Bear in mind that the new body size might make it impossible to install certain prosthetics and bionics!\n\nNOTE: This implant itself is capable of being installed on any animal, regardless of their body size.

ThingDef.label: animal enlarger implant
ThingDef.description: An animal enlarger implant that will increase the body size of the animal, making it more resistant and dangerous. The new body size of the animal will be considered when calculating which implants can be installed on it!\n\nNOTE: This implant itself is capable of being installed on any animal, regardless of their body size.

ThingDef.label: animal additional buoyancy vacuoles
ThingDef.description: An animal animal additional buoyancy vacuoles implant that inserts several hydrogen filled structures inside the animals' body, allowing it to gently glide a few feet in the air. This will negate all terrain movement costs.\n\nNOTE: This implant will have no effect on animals that possess this ability innately, such as Aerofleet.
